Tunable.name: LAYER_OBJECTS_ALARM_TIME
Tunable.description: The frequency that we will create or destroy objects in the festival. Please consult a GPE before changing this value as it will impact performance.

Tunable.name: LAYER_OBJECTS_TO_DESTROY
Tunable.description: The number of objects to destroy at a time when destroying a layer. Please consult a GPE before changing this value as it will impact performance.

Tunable.name: LAYER_OBJECTS_TO_LOAD
Tunable.description: The number of objects to load at a time when loading a layer. Please consult a GPE before changing this value as it will impact performance.
